item.title: Fully customizable color option
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/4"][vc_single_image image="9212" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="vc_azu_single_image-border" alignment="center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][ultimate_spacer height="13"][ultimate_heading main_heading="Fully customizable color option" heading_tag="h3" alignment="center" spacer="no_spacer" spacer_position="top" spacer_img_width="48" line_style="solid" line_height="1" line_color="#333333" icon_type="selector" icon_size="32" icon_style="none" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="50" img_width="48" line_icon_fixer="10" main_heading_font_family="font_family:|font_call:" main_heading_style="font-weight:bold;" main_heading_line_height="desktop:24px;"][/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="24"][vc_column_text]

Full color customizations – easy to change every element, including shortcodes. Changing colors of every single element is behind us. Colors can be added into one group and all you have to do is to drag and drop any chosen color. No need to look for color. It's very time saving. Colors of multiple elements can be changed at the same time. All colors are in one place, easy to change and apply. For example, you don't have to go to at least 20 different places to change every single color in demo. We have it all here. In order to change the color of any elements, all you have to do is to click on the color in menu.

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_spacer height="257" height_on_tabs_portrait="0" height_on_mob_landscape="0" height_on_mob="0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Mega menu
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/4"][vc_single_image image="9211" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="vc_azu_single_image-border"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][ultimate_spacer height="13"][ultimate_heading main_heading="Mega menu" heading_tag="h3" alignment="center" spacer="no_spacer" spacer_position="top" spacer_img_width="48" line_style="solid" line_height="1" line_color="#333333" icon_type="selector" icon_size="32" icon_style="none" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="50" img_width="48" line_icon_fixer="10" main_heading_font_family="font_family:|font_call:" main_heading_style="font-weight:bold;" main_heading_line_height="desktop:24px;"][/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="24"][vc_column_text]

Mega menu with complete configurations to make your site exquisitely awesome. Compatible with necessary widgets, including search, forms, images, maps and etc. Full width menu option. Images and icon can be inserted in menu. Menu items can be left, center or right align. Menu has 6+ hover options. Menu can be moved behind and under logo. Top or bottom slider option in Menu. More suitable for mobile version, menu can be minimized to Burger menu. Caret arrow can show in main menu and sub menu. Divider options in main menu and sub menu.

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_spacer height="281" height_on_tabs_portrait="0" height_on_mob_landscape="0" height_on_mob="0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Portfolio options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/4"][vc_single_image image="9516" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="vc_azu_single_image-border"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][ultimate_spacer height="13"][ultimate_heading main_heading="Portfolio options" heading_tag="h3" alignment="center" spacer="no_spacer" spacer_position="top" spacer_img_width="48" line_style="solid" line_height="1" line_color="#333333" icon_type="selector" icon_size="32" icon_style="none" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="50" img_width="48" line_icon_fixer="10" main_heading_font_family="font_family:|font_call:" main_heading_style="font-weight:bold;" main_heading_line_height="desktop:24px;"][/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="24"][vc_column_text]

1-6 column masonry, carousel & grid layouts. Full width single post without sidebars & details. Select custom categories to show up per portfolio page. Portfolio has additional 17+ beautiful hover effects. Slider option on portfolio and page. Easy use of video, image, slideshow. Hide or show rollover icon on post. Adjust opacity and color of images. Insert custom excerpt length per portfolio page. Specify items on pages.

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_spacer height="305" height_on_tabs_portrait="0" height_on_mob_landscape="0" height_on_mob="0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/4"][vc_single_image image="9222" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="vc_azu_single_image-border"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][ultimate_spacer height="13"][ultimate_heading main_heading="Single click demo importer" heading_tag="h2" alignment="center" spacer="no_spacer" spacer_position="top" spacer_img_width="48" line_style="solid" line_height="1" line_color="#333333" icon_type="selector" icon_size="32" icon_style="none" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="50" img_width="48" line_icon_fixer="10" main_heading_font_family="font_family:|font_call:" main_heading_style="font-weight:bold;" main_heading_line_height="desktop:24px;"][/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="24"][vc_column_text]

With just a single-click, demo, including pages, posts, widgets and other attachments can be imported. Demos can be imported from Admin panel and it also enables you to add other demos from main demo in necessary.

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_spacer height="353" height_on_tabs_portrait="0" height_on_mob_landscape="0" height_on_mob="0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Theme options & Customizer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/4"][vc_single_image image="9213" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" img_size="full" el_class="vc_azu_single_image-border"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][ultimate_spacer height="13"][ultimate_heading main_heading="Theme options & Customizer" heading_tag="h3" alignment="center" spacer="no_spacer" spacer_position="top" spacer_img_width="48" line_style="solid" line_height="1" line_color="#333333" icon_type="selector" icon_size="32" icon_style="none" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="50" img_width="48" line_icon_fixer="10" main_heading_font_family="font_family:|font_call:" main_heading_style="font-weight:bold;" main_heading_line_height="desktop:24px;"][/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="24"][vc_column_text]

Combined theme option and customization. You can preview under customization. Every element has enable or disable function. Site width is fully customizable. Theme option can be maximized and minimized. Page title bar and page title text can be shown and hidden. You can add color or picture to any page and page title bar. On each page, show or hide the header, footer, copyright section. Options are easy to use.

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_spacer height="305" height_on_tabs_portrait="0" height_on_mob_landscape="0" height_on_mob="0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/4"][vc_single_image image="9216" alignment="center" border_color="grey" img_link_large="" img_link_target="_self" el_class="vc_azu_single_image-border" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][ultimate_spacer height="13"][ultimate_heading main_heading="Up to 6 columns footer" heading_tag="h3" alignment="center" spacer="no_spacer" spacer_position="top" spacer_img_width="48" line_style="solid" line_height="1" line_color="#333333" icon_type="selector" icon_size="32" icon_style="none" icon_color_border="#333333" icon_border_size="1" icon_border_radius="500" icon_border_spacing="50" img_width="48" line_icon_fixer="10" main_heading_font_family="font_family:|font_call:" main_heading_style="font-weight:bold;" main_heading_line_height="desktop:24px;"][/ultimate_heading][ultimate_spacer height="24"][vc_column_text]

1-6 column and any widgets on any column. When chosen widgets are more than columns, you can auto arrange widgets to new row. Easy and very neat. No more multiple configurations.

[/vc_column_text][ultimate_spacer height="353" height_on_tabs_portrait="0" height_on_mob_landscape="0" height_on_mob="0"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
